_a-0000eca3-381d-8000-9cf0-011c48011c48_.name: CMGT_EML_TRI_Thread_SetMetaData
_a-0000eca3-381d-8000-9cf0-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
  items: ri!threads,
  expression: rule!CMGT_UTIL_SetRecordFields(
    record: fv!item,
    alwaysOverwrite: {
      a!map(
        field: recordType!CMGT_EML_TRI_Thread.modifiedOn,
        value: now()
      ),
      a!map(
        field: recordType!CMGT_EML_TRI_Thread.modifiedBy,
        value: ri!initiator
      ),
      a!map(
        field: recordType!CMGT_EML_TRI_Thread.threadStatus,
        value: a!match(
          value: ri!eventType,
          equals: "IGNORE",
          then: cons!CMGT_EML_TRI_TRIAGE_STATUS_IGNORED,
          equals: "LINK",
          then: cons!CMGT_EML_TRI_TRIAGE_STATUS_LINKED_TO_CASE,
          whenTrue: or(
            ri!eventType = "NEW_THREAD",
            ri!eventType = "UNLOCK"
          ),
          then: cons!CMGT_EML_TRI_TRIAGE_STATUS_OPEN,
          equals: "LOCK",
          then: cons!CMGT_EML_TRI_TRIAGE_STATUS_IN_PROGRESS,
          equals: "CREATE_CASE",
          then: cons!CMGT_EML_TRI_TRIAGE_STATUS_CREATED_CASE,
          equals: "THREAD_PROCESSING",
          then: cons!CMGT_EML_TRI_TRIAGE_STATUS_PROCESSING,
          default: cons!CMGT_EML_TRI_TRIAGE_STATUS_OPEN
        )
      ),
      a!map(
        field: recordType!CMGT_EML_TRI_Thread.owner,
        value: a!match(
          value: ri!eventType,
          whenTrue: or(
            ri!eventType = "NEW_THREAD",
            ri!eventType = "UNLOCK",
            ri!eventType = "OPEN",
            
          ),
          then: null,
          default: ri!initiator
        )
      )
    },
    neverOverwrite: {
      a!map(
        field: recordType!CMGT_EML_TRI_Thread.isActive,
        value: true()
      ),
      a!map(
        field: recordType!CMGT_EML_TRI_Thread.createdOn,
        value: now()
      ),
      a!map(
        field: recordType!CMGT_EML_TRI_Thread.createdBy,
        value: ri!initiator
      )
    },
    /*Set metadata for all child relationships*/
    childRelationships: {
      a!map(
        field: recordType!CMGT_EML_TRI_Thread.threadSet,
        value: rule!CMGT_EML_TRI_ThreadSet_SetMetaData(
          threadSets: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_EML_TRI_Thread.threadSet],
          initiator: ri!initiator
        )
      ),
      a!map(
        field: recordType!CMGT_EML_TRI_Thread.messages,
        value: rule!CMGT_EML_TRI_Message_SetMetaData(
          message: fv!item[recordType!CMGT_EML_TRI_Thread.messages],
          initiator: ri!initiator
        )
      )
    }
  )
)
